alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:28PM CDT until July 05 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WALWORTH...SOUTHWESTERN WAUKESHA AND SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 927 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palmyra, or 7 miles east of Whitewater, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mukwonago, East Troy, North Prairie, Palmyra, Potter Lake, La Grange, Eagle and Troy Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
